description:
Topic varies year to year. Spring 2004: Patriarchal and Rabbinic Authority in Late Antique Palestine 

The course material will be presented through the reading of texts (in contrast to just talking about the evidence). By approaching the materials in this way, literary and stylistic issues will be part of the course as well; that is to say, it will not be limited to purely linguistic topics. Moreoever, the student thus will gain a firsthand familiarity with the panoply of ancient Hebrew sources at our disposal.
name: TOPICS ON RABBINIC LIT: Patriarchal and Rabbinic Authority in Late Antique Palestine

values.name: TOPICS ON RABBINIC LIT: Patriarchal and Rabbinic Authority in Late Antique Palestine
